item.title: Getting started with OIDC and Dex with kind
item.description: this article covers how you can setup a local cluster in with kind (not rudely), the next one would cover Microsoft Oauth process.

item.title: Golang Defer
item.description: This article covers the basics of defer and closure in golang.
